products.title: Eco Friendly Fr White Recycled Roller Blind
products.description: Their eco-friendly, recycled roller blinds are made from 100% pet recycled waste. This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment. For every sq. Metre of fabric, 9 pet bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind. Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new white roller blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.

products.title: Roma, Pure - Roller Blind
products.description: The snowy white of the roma pure is fresh and cool, allowing plenty of light in from outside, yet offering privacy and neutrality. The fabric is lightweight and durable, making it the ideal option for a blind that could get a lot of use. Light, airy living rooms make beautiful entertainment spaces, and this blind will only help to set that off. The soft hue won't clash in an all-white environment, and also creates an excellent colour break when teamed with bright colours such as emerald greens, poppy reds, and sky blues.

products.description: Their amico blinds are a perfect addition to your household, the very luxurious blinds are very affordable and are of great quality. products.title: Robin N' Frost Roller Blind
products.description: The icy blue colour of the robin n frost roller is perfect for adding a cooler tone to your room - with the icy blue backing and the white print overlaying it makes this blind unique and cool - in more ways than one. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 280cm wide - much wider than most paterned roller blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Speciality White Crane Roller Blind
products.description: A strong and bold pattern, the speciality white crane is great for decor's that require a bold repeating pattern that won't dominate the room because of its colour. The blue and white contrast is perfect for rooms across your home, and you can choose this blind to come as either a dimout, blackout or waterproof fabric. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Isla Pvc Blackout Whisper White Roller Blind
products.description: The subtleness of this exquisite isla pvc blackout whisper white roller blind adds just enough pretty interest to dress up a window. In the palest white with a leafy double-sided design its perfect to create a light and airy space. Ideal for a soft, feminine bedroom, a bathroom or to add a delicate focal point in a kitchen, this dreamy blind is made using a blackout fabric to keep daylight out when you need to and a safe, flame retardant finish.

Available in 5 earthy tones, the range perfectly compliments cool, modern interior styling. As these are a pvc fabric they are both flame retardant & moisture resitent making this an extremely durable product. products.title: Amor White Lotus Roller Blind
products.description: Add some serenity to your home with the pure tones of the amor white lotus roller blind. One of their best-selling roller blinds, the clean hue has a contemporary feel that pairs well with simplistic interiors. The blackout material blind is fully impenetrable to light, perfect for comprehensive shading bedrooms and overexposed areas of your home. Keep your blinds looking their best with this wipe clean fabric.

products.title: Amor Snowfall Roller Blind
products.description: The amor snowfall is the whitest fabric in the amor range. Suitable for neutral environments or locations that need a bit of purity. Being a blackout blind makes this is perfect for bedrooms to get a great nights sleep without the worry if light seeping through the fabric. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Snow - Roller Blind
products.description: The simple yet elegant roma (fr) in snow forms a graceful look with its delicate and pliable cloth, which also holds a quality, flame-retardant benefit. This agile fabric produces a sophisticated feel with its simple rolling mechanism, and in a soothing and versatile white shade. Frame the alluring snow with a contrasting coral or plum shade, to both accent the striking white of the blind and create a distinctive colour scheme for the remaining dcor.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), White - Roller Blind
products.description: White might not be your first instinct when looking for a blackout blind, but don't rule out the palermo (blackout) white just because of its colour. When it comes to keeping out harmful and distracting uv rays, this blind comes top of the class. The wipe-clean fabric of the palermo range makes this the perfect choice for kitchen windows, and will really gleam paired with colourful patterns and light wood worktops.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Snow - Roller Blind
products.description: Light pollution is a recognised problem in many homes, so include the revolutionary and modern origin (blackout) in snow within any decor scheme for a beneficial blind with contemporary colour. The origin (blackout) is a quality crafted collection of blackout blinds that mix both practicality with style, and the gorgeous snow offers this along with cool, clean whiteness. Match the snow with bold blocks of dove grey, cobalt, and alike whites to form a current decor style with contemporary colours.

products.title: Ajanta (Blackout), Pure - Roller Blind
products.description: The ajanta (blackout) in pure is more than simply a white blackout blind. The silvery white background shimmers as the light hits it, and is pleasantly interrupted by the abstract white patterning, making this the perfect blind for adding a little magic to your home. The clean freshness of the pure is perfect for a bathroom, and will look great surrounded by turquoises, whites, and silvers. Or try it in the utility room or cloakroom to provide a touch of icy white sparkle to the room.

products.title: Affinity, Pure - Roller Blind
products.description: The affinity pure takes a lightweight, easy-hanging white fabric with a subtle hint of cream, and uses it to host a pure white, modern pattern. The contrast between the stitching and fabric adds interest to an otherwise neutral blind. Use the affinity pure as part of a fresh, neutral colour scheme in a living room or home office. Or make a real feature of it, by setting it amongst brightly painted walls to make it really stand out in a colourful bedroom or playroom.

products.title: Splash (Blackout), Pure - Roller Blind
products.description: The beautiful white and shimmering accents of the splash (blackout) pure work together to create a pretty and clean blackout blind. A generous and wipe-clean fabric carries this attractive pattern, and is easily rolled and unrolled at leisure. Use the pure in the bathroom for a fresh and spotless look, and complement with silver fixtures and fittings, adding in the occasional splash of blue or turquoise if bold colours are your preference.

products.title: Capri (Blackout), Pure - Roller Blind
products.description: The pure white of the capri (blackout) pure is complemented perfectly by the hints of silver in its delicate pattern. Totally undistinguishable as a blackout blind, due to its pretty style and light colour, the pure is nonetheless incredibly competent when it comes to keeping unwanted light out of your home. The pure would suit a clean, fresh, and contemporary kitchen, with white units and silver accessories to bring out its colour, and would also work as a stylish feature in an otherwise plain utility room or downstairs cloakroom.

products.title: Gibson Perfect White Roller Blind
products.description: The gibson perfect white is a beautiful blind that gives a bright and airy feel even when closed. A solid colour fabric, it works brilliantly in smaller rooms as the pale colouration visually extends the space. Designed to suit damp conditions, the blind's hardwearing fabric is wipe-clean and fire retardant, so it can work in tricky spaces such as bathrooms and kitchens. Choose to have controls on either the left or right according to what best suits your layout.

products.title: Gibson White Dove Roller Blind
products.description: The gibson white dove is a light beige coloured roller blind, use this with brighter colourful decors. Don't pair it with magnolia - otherwise, you might night know where the walls start and the blind ends. This blind is however, brilliant for a bathroom. The fabric is 100% waterproof, making it ideal for placing in a hot, steamy bathroom. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

products.title: Willow Blackout Birch White Roller Blind
products.description: Soft, muted grey with wispy willow branches make a delicate willow blackout birch white electric blackout roller blind choice for a bedroom or living area. It blends well with most neutral dcor and gives a feminine yet contemporary feel to your chosen space. Finished with pollergen, it is a good option for hayfever sufferers as it neutralises pollen so reducing symptoms. The electric operation is easy to use and the blind opens and closes at the touch of a button.

products.description: The fuji silk snow roller blind will blend seamlessly into your interior with its gentle neutral cream colour, while also adding a gorgeous texture to your window with its silky fabric. This blind is very versatile and can be paired in many different ways to create a modern, sophisticated interior.
